name: Midas (Tomate Salat)
description:
Play against Midas ... and the Time! The round is finished once the timer has reached 0 or midas caught you. If you know the story of Midas you know what you can expect will happen once you've touched Midas!

You can move around by using WASD-Keys or the Arrow Keys. 

Also pay attention to the floor! Midas is turning the stone-floor into gold. While you walk slower on gold he will walk faster! 

By collecting the appearing gold you get a point plus one floor tile will turn back into stone again. 

The thing on the top right is a button toggling the pause. Here you can change sound settings + restart the round. If you play the non-web-version then you also find the quit-app-button there.

Thanks for playing Midas and I hope you enjoy the game :-)
